tutorial.speak:
If your church has configured attendance, you can check yourself in via the web portal. Click the Checkin Option on the left to get started
If your church has multiple location or services you will be asked to select a service first. Otherwise this screen will be skipped.
Next you will see a list of people in your household and the groups they are currently marked as attending. This is based on your selections last time you checked in. If the list is correct, click the Checkin button.
Otherwise click on a person to expand their details. You will see all of the service times for this service and the groups that person is attending for each. Click on one to make changes
Here is a list of categories of groups available. Click on one to expand it.
Then select the group within that category that you plan to attend. You can also select "None" at the bottom of the page.
You will be returned to the overview page. Continue to make any changes needed and click Checkin when done.
You will receive a confirmation message that you have been checked in and the attendance reports will be updated accordingly.
